forum.content:
A guy calls a company and orders their 5-day, 10 lb. weight loss program.
有個傢伙打電話給一家公司，訂購他們的“5天，10磅”減重方案

The next day, there's a knock on the door and there stands before him a voluptuous, athletic, 19 year old babe dressed in nothing but a pair of Nike running shoes and a sign around her neck.
隔天，門上一陣敲門聲…一個性感，體態輕盈的19歲辣妹站在他前面，除了一雙Nike跑鞋，身上一絲不掛，而在她脖子上有塊牌子.

She introduces herself as a representative of the weight loss company. The sign reads, "If you can catch me, you can have me."
她自我介紹是減重公司的代表
而那牌子上寫著：如果你可以抓住我，你可以得到我.

Without a second thought, he takes off after her. A few miles later huffing and puffing, he finally gives up.
不假思索，他上路跟在她後面.幾英哩後，氣喘吁吁的他終於放棄了.

The same girl shows up for the next four days and the same thing happens.
接下來的四天中，同一個女孩出現而且發生相同的事.

On the fifth day, he weighs himself and is delighted to find he has lost 10 lbs. as promised.
到第五天，他量體重，高興地發現他已經減掉10磅，如同方案保證.

He calls the company and orders their 5-day/20 pound program.
他打電話給那家公司，又訂了他們的“5天/20磅”方案.

The next day there's a knock at the door and there stands the most stunning, beautiful, sexy woman he has ever seen in his life.
隔天，門上一陣敲門聲…門外站著的是他一生中所見過，最火辣，美麗，性感的女人.

She is wearing nothing but Reebok running shoes and a sign around her neck that reads, "If you catch me you can have me".
除了一雙Reebok跑鞋，她身上一絲不掛，讀著在她脖子上的牌子：如果你能抓住我，你就可以得到我.

Well, he's out the door after her like a shot. This girl is in excellent shape and he does his best, but no such luck.
嗯…他就像子彈射出般地跟在她後面出門.這女孩體能狀態優異，而他出盡全力，但沒那般好運.

So for the next four days, the same routine happens with him gradually getting in better and better shape.
隨著他逐漸變好的體能狀況，在隨後的4天，相同的循環依然發生.


Much to his delight on the fifth day when he weighs himself, he discovers that he has lost another 20 lbs. as promised.
第5天他秤重時，令他大為欣喜地，他發現他又減了20磅，就如方案所保証.


He decides to go for broke and calls the company to order the 7-day/50 pound program
他決定孤注一擲地打給那公司，又訂了“7天/50磅”方案.

"Are you sure?" asks the representative on the phone.
“您確定嗎？”，電話那頭的代表問.

"This is our most rigorous program."
這是我們最嚴酷的方案.

"Absolutely," he replies, "I haven't felt this good in years."
“絕對肯定”，他回答，“這一年來，我不曾覺得那麼好過”

The next day there's a knock at the door; and when he opens it he finds a huge muscular guy standing there wearing nothing but pink running shoes and a sign around his neck that reads, "If I catch you, your ass is mine."
隔天，敲門聲響起，而當他開門時，他見到一個混身肌肉的巨漢，除了一雙粉紅色跑鞋，身上一絲不掛，而他脖子上的牌子：如果我抓住你，你的…驢子就是我的！

He lost 63 pounds that week
那週，他減了63磅.
forum.title: Weight loss program joke-…Bonus for audience
